
Genesis PyAPI Documentation
===========================


Install
-------

To install, run::

  pip install genesis-pyapi

To install for development, run::

  git clone https://github.com/genialis/genesis-pyapi.git
  pip install -e .[docs]


Buildling documentation
-----------------------

.. code-block:: none

  python setup.py build_sphinx


Reference
---------

   :members:

.. autoclass:: genesis.GenProject
   :members:

.. autoclass:: genesis.GenData
   :members:
